00026 // lbann_learning_rate .hpp .cpp - Callback hooks for learning rate schedules
00028 
00029 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback_learning_rate.hpp"
00030 #include <limits>
00031 
00032 namespace lbann {
00033 
00034 lbann_callback_learning_rate::lbann_callback_learning_rate() {}
00035 
00036 lbann_callback_learning_rate::lbann_callback_learning_rate(
00037   std::unordered_set<uint> _layers) : layer_indices(_layers) {}
00038 
00039 void lbann_callback_learning_rate::setup(model* m) {
00040   std::vector<Layer*>& layers = m->get_layers();
00041   for (size_t l = 0; l < layers.size(); ++l) {
00042     Layer* layer = layers[l];
00043     uint idx = layer->get_index();
00044     if (layer_indices.size() == 0 ||
00045         layer_indices.find(idx) != layer_indices.end()) {
00046       if (layer->get_optimizer() != NULL) {
00047         old_lrs[idx] = layer->get_optimizer()->get_learning_rate();
00048         last_idx = idx;
00049       }
00050     }
00051   }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void lbann_callback_learning_rate::on_epoch_begin(model* m) {
00055   std::vector<Layer*>& layers = m->get_layers();
00056   for (size_t l = 0; l < layers.size(); ++l) {
00057     Layer* layer = layers[l];
00058     uint idx = layer->get_index();
00059     if (old_lrs.find(idx) != old_lrs.end()) {
00060       float new_lr = schedule(m, layer);
00061       if (new_lr != old_lrs[idx]) {
00062         old_lrs[idx] = new_lr;
00063         layer->get_optimizer()->set_learning_rate(new_lr);
00064         lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00065         if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00066           std::cout << "Model " << comm->get_model_rank() <<
00067             ": changing layer " << idx << " learning rate to " << new_lr <<
00068             " at epoch " << m->get_cur_epoch() << std::endl;
00069         }
00070       }
00071     }
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 lbann_callback_step_learning_rate::lbann_callback_step_learning_rate(
00076   int step, float amt) : lbann_callback_learning_rate(), step(step), amt(amt) {}
00077 
00078 lbann_callback_step_learning_rate::lbann_callback_step_learning_rate(
00079   int step, float amt, std::unordered_set<uint> _layers) :
00080   lbann_callback_learning_rate(_layers), step(step), amt(amt) {}
00081 
00082 float lbann_callback_step_learning_rate::schedule(model* m, Layer* l) {
00083   float cur_lr = l->get_optimizer()->get_learning_rate();
00084   if (m->get_cur_epoch() % step == 0) {
00085     return cur_lr * amt;
00086   } else {
00087     return cur_lr;
00088   }
00089 }
00090 
00091 lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate::lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate(
00092   int64_t patience, float amt) :
00093   lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate(patience, amt,
00094                                    std::unordered_set<uint>()) {}
00095 
00096 lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate::lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate(
00097   int64_t patience, float amt, std::unordered_set<uint> _layers) :
00098   lbann_callback_learning_rate(_layers), patience(patience), amt(amt),
00099   last_acc(std::numeric_limits<DataType>::lowest()), wait(0) {}
00100 
00101 float lbann_callback_acc_learning_rate::schedule(model* m, Layer* l) {
00102   DataType cur_acc = m->get_test_accuracy();
00103   float cur_lr = l->get_optimizer()->get_learning_rate();
00104   if (cur_acc > last_acc) {
00105     last_acc = cur_acc;
00106     wait = 0;
00107   } else {
00108     if (wait >= patience) {
00109       if (is_last_layer(l)) {
00110         wait = 0;
00111         last_acc = cur_acc;
00112       }
00113       return cur_lr * amt;
00114     } else {
00115       if (is_last_layer(l)) {
00116         ++wait;
00117       }
00118     }
00119   }
00120   return cur_lr;
00121 }
00122 
00123 lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate::lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate(
00124   std::function<float(model*, Layer*)> custom_schedule) :
00125   lbann_callback_learning_rate(), custom_schedule(custom_schedule) {}
00126 
00127 lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate::lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate(
00128   std::function<float(model*, Layer*)> custom_schedule,
00129   std::unordered_set<uint> _layers) :
00130   lbann_callback_learning_rate(_layers), custom_schedule(custom_schedule) {}
00131 
00132 float lbann_callback_custom_learning_rate::schedule(model* m, Layer* l) {
00133   return custom_schedule(m, l);
00134 }
